Item.sqlserver_body: /* Name: quotientpercent created: 6-dec-2005 George J. Carrette */ create function innovator.quotientpercent(@dividend FLOAT, @divisor FLOAT) RETURNS INTEGER AS begin DECLARE @QUOTIENT FLOAT IF @DIVIDEND IS NULL SET @QUOTIENT = NULL ELSE IF @DIVISOR IS NULL SET @QUOTIENT = NULL ELSE IF @DIVISOR = 0 SET @QUOTIENT = NULL ELSE SET @QUOTIENT = (@DIVIDEND * 100.0) / @DIVISOR RETURN @QUOTIENT end
Item.name: quotientpercent
